# 共稼ぎ
---
![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
1).
,共稼ぎ > ともかせぎ,ともかせぎ,共かせぎ > ともかせぎ,ともかせぎ

- (husband and wife) earning a living together
**( Noun Suru verb Intransitive verb Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no';)**
> see also:  [[共働き]]
